LanguageData.ReMe.Log.Tooltip: Logs all removed items at game-start
LanguageData.ReMe.Pawnkind.Tooltip: Removes all pawnkinds tagged with tech-level medieval
LanguageData.ReMe.Faction.Tooltip: Removes all factions tagged with tech-level medieval
LanguageData.ReMe.Research.Tooltip: Removes all research-projects tagged with tech-level medieval
LanguageData.ReMe.Items.Tooltip: Removes all items tagged with tech-level medieval
LanguageData.ReMe.Restart: NOTE: Any changes require a restart to have effect
